text: Neoliodidae is a family of oribatids in the order Oribatida. There are at least 4 genera and 50 described species in Neoliodidae. ==Genera== * Neoliodes Berlese, 1888 * Platyliodes Berlese, 1916 * Poroliodes Grandjean, 1934 * Teleioliodes Grandjean, 1934 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Acariformes
title: Neoliodidae
